title: CCL Track Works - Weekend Early Closures (Stage 6)

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线轨道工程 - 周末提前闭线（第6阶段）
title_translations.ms: Kerja Trek CCL - Tutup Awal Hujung Minggu (Peringkat 6)
title_translations.ta: CCL பாதை பணிகள் - வார இறுதி முன்னதாக மூடல் (படிநிலை 6)

updates.text: Reminder: Circle Line train services will end earlier at 11:00pm tonight (01 Nov 2025, Sat) and commence later at 9:00am tomorrow (02 Nov 2025, Sun). Please use alternative MRT lines and bus services.

Reminder: Circle Line train services will end earlier at 11:00pm tonight (27 Sep 2025, Sat) and commence later at 9:00am tomorrow (28 Sep 2025, Sun). Please use alternative MRT lines and bus services.
Commuters are advised to plan for up to 30 minutes of additional travel time due to the service adjustments, which are meant to support works ahead of the opening of the full Circle Line loop.
